Section.Catchline: Persons entitled to file initial financing statement or continuation statement.

SectionBody.Text: A person may file an initial financing statement or a continuation statement under this part if:

Subsection.Text: The secured party of record authorizes the filing; and
The filing is necessary under this part:

Paragraph.Text: To continue the effectiveness of a financing statement filed before this act takes effect; or
To perfect or continue the perfection of a security interest.
